message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item that's worth $1500000 to you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000. I think this is a fair price considering the value it holds for you.

I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I think I can do better. I'm willing to pay $1100000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it holds for me, and I'm willing to negotiate further to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. I understand that you're looking to get a good deal, but I also need to consider the value of the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $1150000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, and I believe it's still a fair price considering the value the product holds for you.

I understand your concerns, Alice, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $1120000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value it holds for me, and I'm willing to compromise to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
